leve.name: Polished till They Shine (L)
leve.description: Star sapphires are said to symbolize a lifetime of polishing one's dedication to the Fury, and the nobles of the High Houses ever want for jewelry fitted with the stones. Of course, none but the church can provide baubles that have been properly blessed, thus I would pay you in full to bring me quality stones so our gentle lords and ladies may be afforded salvation in the comfort of their homes.
leve.client: Order of the Friars Templar, Brother Padilloux
